Topic.Title: "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request" every time I try to create a game

Posts.EditableText: So, I can't create a new game or textbook, because everytime I try the same message appears: "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request". It's annoying at this point and seems like it's not going to go away any time soon.
Posts.HTML: So, I can't create a new game or textbook, because everytime I try the same message appears: "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request". It's annoying at this point and seems like it's not going to go away any time soon.

Posts.EditableText: Make sure you have the right address for the page. It should start with `https://`, not `http://`.
Posts.HTML: Make sure you have the right address for the page. It should start with https://, not http://.

Posts.EditableText: Had the same problem but typing https:// before the address fixed it. Thanks!
Posts.HTML: Had the same problem but typing https:// before the address fixed it. Thanks!
